'''1.6.1.0''' is the first release for the [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s, released on September 11, 2018, associated to [[Bedrock Edition 1.6.1]].<ref>https://twitter.com/Minecraft/status/1039527221835309058</ref>

== Additions ==
; [[Bedrock Dedicated Server]]s
* A public way to play online, similar to its [[Server|''Java Edition'' counterpart]].
